author: mmusich
body:
# Changes in Global Tag
## RunI simulation
- **RunI Ideal scenario** : [80X_mcRun1_design_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_design_v2) as [80X_mcRun1_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.
  cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_design_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_design_v2/80X_mcRun1_design_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunI Heavy Ions scenario** : [80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2) as [80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2/80X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunI Realistic scenario** : [80X_mcRun1_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_realistic_v2) as [80X_mcRun1_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_realistic_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_realistic_v2/80X_mcRun1_realistic_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunI Proton-Lead scenario** : [80X_mcRun1_pA_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_pA_v2) as [80X_mcRun1_pA_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_pA_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun1_pA_v2/80X_mcRun1_pA_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
## RunII simulation
- **RunII Ideal scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v1) as [80X_mcRun2_design_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v1/80X_mcRun2_design_v0): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1) as [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v0): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_startup_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v1) as [80X_mcRun2_startup_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v1/80X_mcRun2_startup_v0): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunII Heavy Ions scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1) as [80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1/80X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v0): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
## RunI data
- **RunI Offline processing** : [80X_dataRun2_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v2) as [80X_dataRun2_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v2/80X_dataRun2_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunI HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0) (snapshot time set to 2015-01-13 22:00:00 UTC) : 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
## RunII data
- **RunII Offline processing** : [80X_dataRun2_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_v2) as [80X_dataRun2_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v2/80X_dataRun2_v1): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunII HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v0) (snapshot time set to 2015-01-13 22:00:00 UTC) : 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
- **RunII HLT Heavy Ion processing** :  [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1) as [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v0) (snapshot time set to 2015-01-13 22:00:00 UTC) : 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
## Upgrade
- **PhaseI design scenario** : [80X_upgrade2017_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v1) as [80X_upgrade2017_design_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v1/80X_upgrade2017_design_v0): 
  - updated B tag discriminators for HLT with the following taggers: `CombinedSVIVFV2RecoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2PseudoVertex`, `CombinedSVIVFV2NoVertex`
title: New GT for all scenarios: updating b-tagging discriminators for HLT
